Name: (Ominous Ver.) Salami Skirmish - TnH Music Overhaul
Description:
Ever wanted Take and Hold to sound more dangerous? More frantic? Then this is the mod for you!
This mod replaces every single file in the original Take and Hold music bank with original music by me. The mod includes the Ominous sounding variant that has lots of trombone and sounds more menacing and evil, and a quieter version is available on Bonetome for accessibility or any other reason.
Link to full song on Youtube:
https://youtu.be/MF21C-Gt_7g
Link to video showing how the 2 variants sound in game:
https://youtu.be/9W6Xrb-IMZo
ShortDescription: Replaces all music in Take and Hold with new original compositions.
